website_summaries.verdict: This multi-purpose, antioxidant-rich cream can be used all over, including lips and nails.
pros: Even eczema and psoriasis sufferers found skin relief with this cream, which contains honey, amino acids, and B vitamins
A hydrating solution to extra-dry skin, the natural oils and waxes are also fabulous for eyebrows and eyelashes
cons: Some dislike the smell and the texture, which is "greasy"

customer_reviews.title: Really a life saver

This product always starts clearing my skin and making it smooth with a few days and its fine for people like me with really sensitive skin. I recommend this to everyone even though its pricey it's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Not as magical as promised.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice product, great naturally based salve, but a tad expensive for the results I received from using it. I purchased this for eye eczema. Becareful not to get this salve/ointment into your eyes, I made the mistake of putting it a bit close to the lid, and it seeped into eye. Had a difficult time getting it cleaned out of my eye. Do not put on your lips, for chapped lips, as it tastes terrible.

customer_reviews.title: 24 Hour Difference - Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I use Tazarotene for my acne and because it causes desquamation, any scab or scratch on the face is exacerbated. I had this huge wound on my face from an adverse reaction and was freaking out about the healing time taking weeks. I have the Honey Savior on in the first photo so it's hard to how large and scaly the scab was, but the second photo is taken only 24 HOURS later! I am so grateful it helped my skin so quickly, I wear makeup every day and putting foundation over a scab does not work. I am so glad I just had to exfoliate the dead skin off and now my face is smooth and healed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Like applying thin honey on your face
customer_reviews.text: This has a lovely fragrance and while it is sheer, the thickness of the product Is great if you want to create a barrier for more moisture on your skin by applying more product. I would recommend for dry, normal and combination skin but not for oily skin.

product_meta.title: Farmacy Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve - Hydrating & Nourishing Balm - 46g
feature_bullets: THE FARMACY WAY: Our goal is simple. We want to bring out the best version of your radiant self with the best possible, naturally derived ingredients. Each women's skincare and beauty product we craft uses cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients that Mother Nature has been so kind as to provide for us.

REVITALIZE THE RIGHT WAY: Loaded with 132 nutrients, including amino acids, antioxidants and vitamins A, B, C & royal jelly; this healing salve truly is a savoir. Nourish, protect, and support skin renewal for a healthy glow.
NATURALLY SOOTHING: Used since ancient times for wound care, honey naturally retains moisture and remains one of the best ways to relieve dry skin.

MULTIPURPOSE: This versatile salve can save the day in so many different ways! Use as a hand lotion to soften skin. Rescue parched lips as a lip balm. Or use it as a face gloss on cheekbones for a spotlight effect.
HOW TO USE: Apply a small amount to clean skin and massage until fully absorbed. Use as needed throughout the body for targeted care.
